alert.note: Alert for Ransom (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 9:39PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ransom County through 1015 PM CDT... At 938 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Ransom, or 28 miles south of Valley City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fort Ransom around 940 PM CDT. Fort Ransom State Park around 945 PM CDT. Lisbon around 1015 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
